remarks: Subspace join for ` DVecH ` vector space.  (Contributed by NM, 19-Jul-2014.)
statement:
djhval.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
djhval.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
djhval.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
djhval.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
djhval.j $e |- .\/ = ( ( joinH ` K ) ` W ) $.
djhval $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( X C_ V /\ Y C_ V ) ) -> ( X .\/ Y ) = ( ._|_ ` ( ( ._|_ ` X ) i^i ( ._|_ ` Y ) ) ) ) $.
